DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine effect surgical priority either emergency elective postoperative pain caesarean section operation . Patients whose undergo caesarean section operation include study . Patients invite complete Pain Catastrophizing Scale questionnaire preoperative period . The patient divide two group term apply surgical priority whether emergency elective . After caesarean section , patient control analgesia use pain relief . And intensity pain measure use numerical rating scale .
DOC.brief_title: The Evaluation Postoperative Pain After Caesarean Section
DOC.detailed_description: Pain main problem postoperative period . Postoperative analgesic consumption associate physical psychological condition individual . This study aim investigate effect surgical priority either emergency elective postoperative pain caesarean section operation . Patients invite complete pain catastrophizing scale questionnaire preoperative period . A total 100 patient include study . Patients divide two group term surgical priority whether emergency elective . Spinal general anesthesia perform patient . In postoperative period , patient control analgesia apply pain relief numerical rating scale use determine pain intensity 1st , 2nd , 6th , 12th , 24th hour . The analgesic consumption 24 hour record .
